entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
